title: Ep. 2809 - Bhide Takes Jethalal To Catch Tapu - Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah - 2 September 2019
shortDesc: Bhide goes to Jethalal's shop to take him for the movies. His true intention is to catch Sonu and Tapu at the theatre and that too in front of Jethalal. After a lot of hindrances, they reach the theatre. They enter the hall and scan the hall.

title: Ep. 2810 - Sonu Reveals The Truth - Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah - 3 September 2019
shortDesc: Bhide and Jethalal don't find Tapu and Sonu anywhere. Then Sonu and Tapu arrive at Bhide's house. Bhide rushes back and starts questioning them. The truth is that Sonu and Tapu had gone to the mall to get gifts for Bhide and Madhvi. Stay tuned.

title: Ep. 2811 - Jethalal Does Exercise - Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah - 4 September 2019
shortDesc: Jethalal wakes up due to a nightmare. Then Tapu and Champak Chacha make him workout. Tapu teaches him Suryanamaskar. All three of them work out for some time. Babita also comes for help. Stay tuned to know more!

title: Ep. 2812 - The Clubhouse Meeting - Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah - 5 September 2019
shortDesc: Bhide has a lot of work for the Gokuldham society. Jethalal brings his maintenance cheque to Bhide and at that time Bhide informs him that there is a meeting related to Ganesh Chaturthi.  Jethalal is a little late and argues with Iyer. Stay Tuned.

title: Ep. 2813 - Ganesh Chaturthi Preparations - Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah - 6 September 2019
shortDesc: Everyone at Gokuldham society is preparing for the Ganesh Festival. They are all having fun. Some of them have gone to get the Ganesh idol, some of the others are helping with the decorations. The stage for the Ganesh idol is also being set up.

title: Ep. 2814 - The Storm - Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah - 9 September 2019
shortDesc: Everyone in Gokuldham society is very excited about the Ganesh festival. They are all very happy about it. The men want to check the decorations done by Tapu Sena. In the end, everyone goes to sleep early. In the night, there is a storm.

title: Ep. 2815 - Miraculous Help - Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah - 10 September 2019
shortDesc: All the people at Gokuldham society are extremely tensed with the platform for Ganapati. At last, they try by themselves and even then when it doesn't work, they pray to Ganpati Bappa. In a while, they have several workers to helps them. Stay tuned.

title: Ep. 2816 - Gokuldham Rangarang Karyakram - Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah - 11 September 2019
shortDesc: The Gokuldham Society members realize that it was Ganapati Bappa himself who had sent help to them. The next morning the idol is brought to the platform and the puja is done with a lot of happiness. Tapu Sena announces Gokuldham  Rangarang Karyakram.

title: Ep. 2817 - Everybody Wants To Win - Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah - 12 September 2019
shortDesc: All the members of the Gokuldham Society are upset and excited to know what they need to perform for the Gokuldham Rangarang Karyakram. They all want to win the program and are trying to know about it from Tapu Sena. Stay tuned.

title: Ep. 2818 - Jethalal Thinks Of A Plan - Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah - 13 September 2019
shortDesc: Jethalal gets tensed for the risen problem and thinks of solving it. Later he calls Gogi for some help but Goli arrives in the scene and helps him out in solving his problem. Stay tuned!

title: Ep. 2819 - Time To Dance - Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah - 16 September 2019
shortDesc: The Gokuldham Rangarang Karyakram is on and all the people are getting their chance to entertain. The turns are beings decided on random. It is a colorful and fun event. Stay tuned to know more!

title: Ep. 2820 - Cultural Programme In The Society - Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah - 17 September 2019
shortDesc: Kids perform on the occasion of Ganesh Chaturthi and Taarak tells everyone that the performance carried moral values about staying happy in life. Jethalal, Bhide, and Sodhi in the meantime recollect their old memories. Stay tuned!

title: Ep. 2821 - More Fun And Entertainment - Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah - 18 September 2019
shortDesc: The Gokuldham Rangarang Karyakram continues. Sodhi and Roshan have a romantic dance and then Tarak and Anjali get on the stage for something different. Popatlal is very excited about the programme. Stay tuned to know more!

title: Ep. 2822 - Jethalal Dreams Of Babita - Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah - 19 September 2019
shortDesc: The programme continues and starts with Tapu and Sonu. They perform a great dance and even Popatlal dances. Iyer and Babita dance and in the process, Jethalal dreams of dancing with Babita. Stay tuned.

title: Ep. 2823 - Jethalal's Rocking Performance - Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah - 20 September 2019
shortDesc: Jethalal performs a great dance and he remembers Daya while doing it. After the performance, it is time for the award ceremony. A special guest comes to announce the awards. Stay tuned.
